doc.title: Kojak

credit.role: Capt. Ernie Perkins, Narcotics Division LAPD

doc.plot: Lt. Theo Kojak is the main character in this popular television police drama. Kojak is a tough cop, but his trademark is a fondness for lollipops. Despite his difficult work, he tirelessly brings criminals to justice while staying upbeat and good-natured.
